verses.verse: This <WG5124> know <WG1097> also, <WG1161> that <WG3754> in <WG1722> the last <WG2078> days <WG2250> perilous <WG5467> times <WG2540> shall come. <WG1764>

For <WG1063> men <WG444> shall be <WG2071> lovers of their own selves, <WG5367> covetous, <WG5366> boasters, <WG213> proud, <WG5244> blasphemers, <WG989> disobedient <WG545> to parents, <WG1118> unthankful, <WG884> unholy, <WG462>
Without natural affection, <WG794> trucebreakers, <WG786> false accusers, <WG1228> incontinent, <WG193> fierce, <WG434> despisers of those that are good, <WG865>
Traitors, <WG4273> heady, <WG4312> highminded, <WG5187> lovers of pleasures <WG5369> more <WG3123> than <WG2228> lovers of God; <WG5377>
Having <WG2192> a form <WG3446> of godliness, <WG2150> but <WG1161> denying <WG720> the <WG3588> power <WG1411> thereof: <WG846> from such turn away. <WG665> <WG5128>

For <WG1063> of <WG1537> this sort <WG5130> are <WG1526> they which creep <WG1744> into <WG1519> houses, <WG3614> and <WG2532> lead captive <WG162> silly women <WG1133> laden <WG4987> with sins, <WG266> led away <WG71> with divers <WG4164> lusts, <WG1939>
Ever <WG3842> learning, <WG3129> and <WG2532> never <WG3368> able <WG1410> to come <WG2064> to <WG1519> the knowledge <WG1922> of the truth. <WG225>

Now <WG1161> as <WG3739> <WG5158> Jannes <WG2389> and <WG2532> Jambres <WG2387> withstood <WG436> Moses, <WG3475> so <WG3779> do these <WG3778> also <WG2532> resist <WG436> the <WG3588> truth: <WG225> men <WG444> of corrupt <WG2704> minds, <WG3563> reprobate <WG96> concerning <WG4012> the <WG3588> faith. <WG4102>

But <WG235> they shall proceed <WG4298> no <WG3756> further: <WG1909> <WG4119> for <WG1063> their <WG846> folly <WG454> shall be <WG2071> manifest <WG1552> unto all <WG3956> men, as <WG5613> theirs <WG1565> also <WG2532> was. <WG1096>
But <WG1161> thou <WG4771> hast fully known <WG3877> my <WG3450> doctrine, <WG1319> manner of life, <WG72> purpose, <WG4286> faith, <WG4102> longsuffering, <WG3115> charity, <WG26> patience, <WG5281>

Persecutions, <WG1375> afflictions, <WG3804> which <WG3634> came <WG1096> unto me <WG3427> at <WG1722> Antioch, <WG490> at <WG1722> Iconium, <WG2430> at <WG1722> Lystra; <WG3082> what <WG3634> persecutions <WG1375> I endured: <WG5297> but <WG2532> out of <WG1537> them all <WG3956> the <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> delivered <WG4506> me. <WG3165>
Yea, <WG1161> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> that will <WG2309> live <WG2198> godly <WG2153> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> shall suffer persecution. <WG1377>
But <WG1161> evil <WG4190> men <WG444> and <WG2532> seducers <WG1114> shall wax worse and worse, <WG4298> <WG1909> <WG5501> deceiving, <WG4105> and <WG2532> being deceived. <WG4105>

But <WG1161> continue <WG3306> thou <WG4771> in <WG1722> the things which <WG3739> thou hast learned <WG3129> and <WG2532> hast been assured of, <WG4104> knowing <WG1492> of <WG3844> whom <WG5101> thou hast learned <WG3129> them;

And <WG2532> that <WG3754> from <WG575> a child <WG1025> thou hast known <WG1492> the <WG3588> holy <WG2413> Scriptures, <WG1121> which are able <WG1410> to make thee wise <WG4679> <WG4571> unto <WG1519> salvation <WG4991> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

All <WG3956> Scripture <WG1124> is given by inspiration of God, <WG2315> and <WG2532> is profitable <WG5624> for <WG4314> doctrine, <WG1319> for <WG4314> reproof, <WG1650> for <WG4314> correction, <WG1882> for <WG4314> instruction <WG3809> in <WG1722> righteousness: <WG1343>
That <WG2443> the <WG3588> man <WG444> of God <WG2316> may be <WG5600> perfect, <WG739> thoroughly furnished <WG1822> unto <WG4314> all <WG3956> good <WG18> works. <WG2041>
